headline: Mettler-Toledo (MTD) Reports Q2 Earnings: What Key Metrics Have to Say
summary: Although the revenue and EPS for Mettler-Toledo (MTD) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended June 2025, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

headline: Why Mettler-Toledo (MTD) Shares Are Plunging Today
summary: Shares of precision measurement company Mettler-Toledo (NYSE:MTD) fell 5.1% in the afternoon session after investors focused on declining profitability and the future impact of new tariffs, even though the company's second-quarter results beat analyst expectations. While Mettler-Toledo posted higher sales and adjusted earnings that surpassed forecasts, its reported net income and earnings per share declined from the previous year.
